heading: HR00829
0: RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE SENSE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO R. DUTERTE TO SEEK EXECUTIVE CLEMENCY FOR THE CASE OF FILIPINA OVERSEAS WORKER JENNIFER ARESGADO DALQUEZ TO THE GOVERNMENT OF THE UNITED ARAB EMIRATES TO SAVE HER FROM DEATH SENTENCE WITH A VIEW TO STRENGTHEN INTERNATIONAL PARTNERSHIP TO THE PROMOTION AND PROTECTION OF THE RIGHTS AND WELFARE OF OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS (OFWs)
